Background: Acolyte Deity: Gozreh

Unburdened Iron: Suffers no Speed penalty from armor
Rock Runner: Moves normally over difficult terrain caused by stone or earth

Combat
Hit Points: 23 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Breastplate Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Clan Dagger (+6 1d4+1 P/B; strength; expert); Light Pick (+6 1d4+1 P [Crit d8]; strength; expert); Longspear (+6 1d8+1 P; strength; expert); Shield Boss (+6 1d6+1 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Dwarven Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Familiarity (Dwarf Weapons; Battle Axe; Pick; Warhammer)
Mountain's Stoutness: +1 Hit Points
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Boulder Roll: (2) Step into a foe's square forces a 5' move (Fortitude vs. Athletics critical success negates; normal success negates but inflicts 2 HP bludgeoning)
Dwarven Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon dwarf weapons
Exacting Strike: (1) Strike does not count toward multiple attack penalty on failure
March The Mines: (2) Strides or Burrows 15' twice, taking along an adjacent willing ally
Mountain's Stoutness: -1 dying recovery DC
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Rock Dwarf: +2 DC vs. Reposition, Shove, Trip, and magical knock prone/Reduces any forced move distance of 10' or more by half
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Stone Bones: (R) Successful DC 17 flat check turns a critical physical hit into a normal hit
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +5 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Call On Ancient Blood: (R) Gives +1 vs. magic until the end of turn
Death Warden Dwarf: Successful saves vs. void and undead effects are critical successes
Dwarven Doughtiness: Reduces frightened condition by 2 at the end of turn
Forge Dwarf: Has fire resistance 1 and treats environmental heat as 1 step less extreme
Stonewall: (R) Self becomes petrified until the end of turn, negating damage from the triggering effect or failed Fortitude save that would not affect stone
Strong-Blooded Dwarf: Has poison resistance 1 and reduces poison stage by 2 (virulent 1) with a successful save vs. poison, or by 3 (virulent 2) with a critical success
Magic
Attack: Divine Innate: +3 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Divine Innate: 13 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Magic Passage (D1): (2) TODO
Meld Into Stone (D3): (2) Allows self to enter a touched stone, retaining the ability to hear outside sounds, for 10 min
Magic Notes:
Stonegate: Knows the Magic Passage divine innate spell; may cast it once per day to open passages through earth or stone
Stonewalker: Knows the Meld Into Stone divine innate spell; may cast it once per day
Defy The Darkness: Cannot use darkness magic
Telluric Power: Inflicts additional damage equal to the number of weapon damage dice to a foe standing on the same earth or stone surface
